name: Bitcoin/Lightning Payment Gateway – LNBits
author: Phaedrus

sections.description:
Accept Bitcoin on your WooCommerce store, instantly over Lightning, and without extra fees.

Issues and Development

If you find a bug, or have an idea for improvement, please file an issue or send a pull request.

If you need help, you can join our support group on Telegram: https://t.me/+h9utj7CKAiQ5NTI8.

External services used by this plugin

LNBits

This plugin uses LNBits instance (lnbits.com by default, or your own) for creating the invoice.
https://lnbits.org/

OpenNode API

This plugin uses opennode.co API for converting fiat currencies into Bitcoin, according to the current rates.
https://developers.opennode.com/reference/exchange-rates

Google Charts

This plugin uses Google Charts API for generating the QR code.
https://developers.google.com/chart

Donation

If you find this plugin useful and would like to donate few sats to support the development, send some using LNBits!
